pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'recipes' Extension for Persistent Homology and Its Vectorizations // Topological data analytic methods in machine learning rely on vectorizations of the persistence diagrams that encode persistent homology, as surveyed by Ali al (2000) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2212.09703. Persistent homology can be computed using 'TDA' and 'ripserr' and vectorized using 'TDAvec'. The Tidymodels package collection modularizes machine learning in R for straightforward extensibility; see Kuhn Silge (2022, ISBN:978-1-4920-9644-3). These 'recipe' steps and 'dials' tuners make efficient algorithms for computing and vectorizing persistence diagrams available for Tidymodels workflows.
